text: 21:17 1 Atriviba 11:36; Onger Akaba 132:17Ezɨ Seruian otarim Abisai, Devit bagha iza an akuragha Filistian kam mɨsoghezɨma an areme. Ezɨ mɨdorozir gumaziba akar gavgavim Devit mɨgɨa ghaze, “E mangɨ mɨsoghamin dughiamɨn nɨ e ko mangan kogham. Nɨ mati lamɨn angazangarir Israelia e ganɨdim, nɨ lamɨn kam damightɨ, a mungeghan markɨ.”
